text:
Can AI generate videos too?
Well Of course! It can use media such as
images, audio, and other videos to create new videos.

Image to Video generation:
Video can be created by multiple images.

Audio to Video generation:
Using features of the audio, AI can generate new videos that correspond to the audio.

Video to Video generation:
Using videos to:
Extend the source
Manipulate the existing video.
We will explore more on video generation and more in the Deepfake Videos module
Please click on either Text, Image, Audio, or Video
